title: Client creating multiple processes

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Recently League is creating multiple processes. Anyone else seeing this?

I am having great difficulty in running League lately and have gone to great lengths to try to fix it.

replies.body: It's not uncommon for League to create several processes like that. If you're having troubles getting League to run and you see those processes running even without League open, then go ahead and end all of those and try starting League again once they're all closed.

Thank you for the response!
They are not the problem(thought it might be), but it is something that never use to happen before.
No, they only happen with League open.

Having a problem with Windows causing a 100% disk usage bug.
This is the root of problems happening in League, with the screen getting locked up.
It got so much worse with the last patch.
Now I have tried many fixes for the 100% disk usage, and seem to have that fixed.

But, in game, still getting a screen stutter (short 2 secs screen freezes); and I see many other people are having this same problem since the new patch...

Hmmmm yea League really shouldn't be eating up 100% disk usage that's for sure. This is a little more up our tech guys ally, so go ahead and shoot them a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Make sure to detail that 100% disk usage and send any other useful screenshots their way and you'll be in good hands with them!

Are you unable to open league and play it? For me, the badge flashes on the screen for a few seconds, then goes away. My process says "LoL Patcher."
Riot isn't very helpful on this topic, I have had a ticket with my league of legends logs for two days now with no response or help. Sucks.
